title: Health Check Report
description: Output format for local storage health checks

disk_ok.description: True if disk space is above 10% threshold

sample_files_checked.description: Number of files sampled in quick check

total_files_expected.description: Total files expected based on database records (full scan only)

total_files_found.description: Total files found on filesystem (full scan only)

missing_files.description: List of paths that should exist but don't

orphan_files.description: List of paths that exist but have no database record

hash_mismatches.description: Files where local and CDN hashes don't match

action_taken.description: Description of any automatic remediation performed

quickCheck.description: Minimal properties for hourly quick check

fullScan.description: Full properties for daily comprehensive scan
